mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.shop_desc, s.addr, s.phone, s.img, s.priority, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.enable_status, s.advice, z.zone_id, z.name AS z_name, sc.id AS sc_id, sc.name AS sc_name FROM tb_shop s, tb_zone z, tb_shop_category sc WHERE s.zone_id = z.zone_id AND s.shop_category_id = sc.id AND s.id = #{shopId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shop(name, owner_id, zone_id, priority, shop_desc, advice, addr, phone, img, enable_status, create_time, update_time, shop_category_id) VALUES (#{name},#{owner.id},#{zone.zoneId}, #{priority},#{shopDesc},#{advice},#{addr},#{phone}, #{img},#{enableStatus}, #{createTime},#{updateTime},#{shopCategory.id})
